title: Which OSI layer traffic is supported by the OCI Network Load Balancer?
Which statement about a Virtual Cloud Network (VCN) is true?

answers.answer: A VCN can have only one public subnet and more than one private subnet.
A VCN can reside only in a single region but can span multiple availability domains.
A VCN can span OCI regions.
A VCN can be used with only one instance.

title: Which component is NOT created by default with the creation of a Virtual Cloud Network?
Which statement about Virtual Cloud Network (VCN) peering between two VCNs is NOT valid?

answers.answer: Peered VCNs cannot have overlapping CIDRs.
Peered VCNs can exist in the same OCI region.
Peered VCNs can exist in different OCI regions.
A VCN peering connection is a VPN-based connection.

title: Which VCN component blocks inbound traffic, but enables outbound traffic to the internet?
